steps.text: Camber angle is controlled by shims (1) positioned between the upper hub carrier and the upper swivel joint carrier . Shims are available in 1mm thickness.
Rear wheel camber using optical alignment measuring equipment. For dimensions refer to “Technical Data”
To decrease negative camber angle (move towards zero), add shims. To increase negative camber, remove shims -1 mm shim will alter camber by approximately 0.3°.
Bolts; swivel joint carrier to hub carrier - 45 Nm .
